TC_Summary: Verify Smart Banner Display on Mobile Browser - Android
Description: This test case verifies that the smart banner is displayed correctly on an Android device when accessing PSC through a mobile browser.
Test Steps: 1. Open a mobile browser on an Android device.
2. Navigate to the PSC application login page.
Expected Result: 1. Smart Banner: Displayed at the top or bottom of the screen.
2. App Name: Displayed correctly.
3. App Information: 'Download PaySchools Central Mobile App for easy mobile payments, manage student accounts, lunch balances, fees, and more—all at your fingertips!'
4. App Screenshots: Displayed correctly as per design.
5. Install Button: Visible and correctly labeled.
6. Close Button: Visible and correctly displayed.

TC_Summary: Verify Smart Banner - Install Button Functionality - Android
Description: This test case verifies that clicking the 'Install' button on the smart banner redirects the user to the Google Play Store on an Android device.
Test Steps: 1. Open a mobile browser on an Android device.
2. Navigate to the PSC application login page.
3. Click on the 'Install' button in the smart banner.
Expected Result: 1. Redirection: User is redirected to the Google Play Store listing for the PSM mobile application.

TC_Summary: Verify Smart Banner - GET Button Functionality - iOS

Test Steps: 1. Open a mobile browser on an iOS device.

TC_Summary: Verify Smart Banner - Open Button Functionality
Description: This test case verifies that the 'Open' button is displayed instead of 'Install'/'GET' when the PSM app is already installed, and clicking it opens the app.
Test Steps: 1. Install the PSM mobile application on the device.
2. Open a mobile browser on the device.
3. Navigate to the PSC application login page.
4. Click on the 'Open' button in the smart banner.
Expected Result: 1. Button Label: 'Open' button is displayed instead of 'Install'/'GET'.
2. App Launch: Clicking the 'Open' button launches the PSM mobile application.

TC_Summary: Verify Smart Banner - Close Button Functionality
Description: This test case verifies that clicking the close button dismisses the smart banner.
Test Steps: 1. Open a mobile browser on a device.
2. Navigate to the PSC application login page.
3. Click on the close (x) button in the smart banner.
Expected Result: 1. Banner Dismissal: The smart banner is closed and no longer visible on the screen.

TC_Summary: Verify Smart Banner - Expanded and Collapsed Views
Description: This test case verifies that the smart banner can be expanded and collapsed correctly.
Test Steps: 1. Open a mobile browser on a device.
2. Navigate to the PSC application login page.
3. Verify the banner is in its expanded view by default.
4. Click on the collapse icon.
5. Verify the banner collapses to the collapsed view, showing only the app name and buttons.
6. Click on the expand icon.
7. Verify the banner expands back to the expanded view, showing all content.
Expected Result: 1. Default View: Banner is in expanded view upon loading.
2. Collapsed View: Banner successfully collapses to show only app name and buttons.
3. Expanded View: Banner successfully expands to show all content.
